attributes.action: Replace Long term Dole with Ration Book
attributes.additional_details: Replace the current system of Dole/Job seekers benefit with a Ration book system for all claims over 2 years long.  Pay unemployment benefit to only those who have paid National insurance.  All other claims will be met by a book of Food and Clothing coupons.  Drawn up in the same way as the WW2 system.  What is needed for life plus 10%.  No coupons for Tobacco or alcohol products.  They are the reward of the working person.
